title: Nova Controller CLI Configuration
description: Configuration settings for the novactl application.

keycloak_server_url.description: Base URL of the Keycloak server (e.g., https://keycloak.example.com).

keycloak_realm.description: The Keycloak realm to authenticate against.

keycloak_client_id.description: The Keycloak Client ID registered for novactl.

keyring_service_name.description: The service name used for storing tokens in the system keyring.

additional_scopes.description: Space-separated list of additional OAuth scopes to request.

token_leeway_seconds.description: Leeway in seconds for token expiration validation to account for clock skew.

ssl_verify.description: Verify SSL/TLS certificates for HTTPS requests. Can be true, false, or a path to a CA bundle.

log_level.description: Set the application log level for file logging.

console_log_level.description: Set the application log level for console output.
